review: We purchased the Fire primarily to use in conjunction with our Kindle to stream internet content on the TV. My husband is able to stream his sports-car racing events on the TV screen with no problem! Not only that but we will use it to watch our Amazon prime movies and use it for Netflix and Hulu. Great buy.
